metadata.Title: CVE-2015-0227 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Apache WSS4J before 1.6.17 and 2.x before 2.0.2 allows remote attackers to bypass the requireSignedEncryptedDataElements configuration via a vectors related to "wrapping attacks."

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0227` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwss4j-java - 1.6.15-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wss4j package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6.15-2').
